**v1.0.3.1 - 2018.11.10**
- Fixed: Class support

**v1.0.3 - 2018.10.15**
- Fixed: Class support

**v1.0.2 - 2018.09.11**
- Fixed: Wheel description design
- Fixed: Some texts not translated
- Added: Slices text color option
- Added: Option to set time to show popup again when customers close and do not spin
- Added: GDPR checkbox

- Updated: Class support

- Added: Select Google fonts
- Added: Class wp-lucky-wheel-popup-icon to embed in elsewhere
- Fixed: Responsive on mobile

**v1.0.0**
- First release.
